intro.name: Suheda Sener
paragraphs: I love creating things that make everyday life easier, especially when they start from a small idea and turn into a working solution.
I'm curious, practical, and enjoy building something visible and useful digitally.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi, I'm Suheda, a curious developer and student who loves building things that start as simple thoughts and end up as useful digital tools that make life easier.
about.story: My interest in coding began when I switched from Metallurgical Engineering to IT and realized I could spend hours solving problems and building tools without noticing time pass. Since then, I've been on a journey to learn, build, and grow in the world of software development.
about.experience: I am currently studying Information Technology at Oulu University of Applied Sciences. During my studies, I took part in a cross-university Erasmus+ project in the Netherlands. Throughout my education, I have worked on several full-stack projects as part of coursework and personal interest.
about.techIntro: Technologies I've been working with recently include:

projectList.label: Sports Matchmaking Web Platform (In Progress)
projectList.title: MatchNPlay
projectList.description: A solo project I started after noticing the need for players to easily find games and teammates. Currently building the backend with authentication, team management, and chat features.

details.overview: MatchNPlay is an ongoing project where Iâ€™m developing a sports matchmaking platform. It helps people organize games, form teams, and connect with others through chat and feedback. The backend is being designed with scalable architecture and authentication.
features: Future integration of scheduling and notifications
challenges: Setting up a Dockerized development environment for backend and database
Implementing OTP-based authentication and email verification with MailHog
Integrating Redis caching to improve performance
Designing a scalable database schema for users, games, teams, and chat
role: Started as a solo initiative after identifying a real-world need
Designing the backend architecture and schema
Implementing authentication, game/team logic, and communication features

projectList.label: Advanced Web Application
projectList.title: NordFlix Movie App
projectList.description: A full-stack web application for browsing movies and TV shows, writing reviews, saving favorites, and joining interest-based groups. Integrates with TMDb API for global movie/TV data and Finnkino API for Finland cinema schedules.

details.overview: NordFlix is a full-stack web application for browsing movies and TV shows, writing reviews, saving favorites, and joining interest-based groups. It integrates with TMDb API for global movie/TV data and Finnkino API for Finland cinema schedules.
features: Browse movies and TV shows with detailed info
Join and interact in interest-based groups
Real-time showtimes in Finland from Finnkino API
challenges: Real-time data integration: Implemented API fetch and caching for performance
Testing: Automated tests with Mocha to ensure reliability
Scalable hosting: Deployed backend on Azure and frontend on Render
role: Developed full-stack features (frontend UI + backend APIs)
Integrated TMDb and Finnkino APIs
Wrote automated Mocha tests
Managed deployment and performance optimization

projectList.label: Mobile App Project
projectList.title: X-it Project
projectList.description: An integrated escape room system with a tablet check-in app and a social mobile app, built using React Native, Nest.js, PostgreSQL, and Docker.

details.overview: X-it is a two-part escape room platform developed as part of a short-term Erasmus+ exchange project in collaboration with students from the Netherlands. The project included a tablet app for on-site check-in and puzzle monitoring (team of 3 students) and a backend with a management system supporting a related mobile social app (team of 4 students). The X-it platform provides a complete solution for escape room operations, including managing rooms, scheduling games, and handling bookings.It ensures smooth coordination between on-site activities and mobile user engagement. The platform allows tracking of player progress, session statistics, and provides real-time updates for both staff and players.
features: Tablet check-in app with QR ticket scanning
Real-time monitoring of puzzle and clue status (simulated with Firebase)
Automatic session tracking and statistics (time, hints used, success/failure)
Mobile social app for viewing stats, leaderboards, and connecting with other players
Company-side management for room scheduling, company profiles, and subscriptions
challenges: The biggest challenge was simulating escape room hardware without physical devices. This was solved by integrating Firebase to replicate real-time signals from puzzle status and clue triggers.
role: Contributed part-time as a backend developer. I developed backend features to manage games, players, and bookings, ensuring valid bookings, linking players to games, and keeping data consistent with the app.
Implemented company-side features such as registration, room management, and scheduling
Worked on Firebase integration to simulate hardware interactions for the tablet app
Assisted in containerization setup with Docker

projectList.label: Recipe Sharing Web Application
projectList.title: Tastopia
projectList.description: A recipe-sharing platform where users can share, search, and rate recipes with an intuitive, community-focused design.

details.overview: Tastopia is a recipe-sharing platform developed as my first web development school project over 6 weeks in a team of 4. It connects food enthusiasts through sharing, searching, and rating recipes. The project earned a grade of 5/5 and received feedback for being ahead of most peers due to its robust features and polished UI.
features: Share custom recipes with descriptions and images
Search recipes by keywords or categories
Rate and review other usersâ€™ recipes
Responsive UI for mobile and desktop
challenges: Implementing JWT-based authentication: Integrated JWT with Express middleware to validate tokens, ensuring only registered users could share, rate, or review recipes.
Building a responsive UI: Utilized Bootstrapâ€™s grid system and custom CSS media queries to create a seamless experience across mobile and desktop devices.
Team collaboration: Adopted Scrum methodology with daily standups and HackNPlan for task management, enabling effective communication and task division among the 4-person team.
role: Contributed to designing the database schema using PostgreSQL and Sequelize
Implemented backend APIs with Express for features like recipe search and user authentication
Built major frontend pages, including the homepage, recipe details, and search results, using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap

projectList.label: Portfolio Website
projectList.title: Personal Portfolio
projectList.description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills with multilingual support and animations.

details.overview: A personal portfolio showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.
challenges: Designed responsive layouts for all devices
role: Designed and built the entire site from scratch

projectList.label: Web Scraping Automation
projectList.title: Duunitori Job Scraper
projectList.description: An automation tool that mimics an API by scraping job listings from Duunitoriâ€™s website using Puppeteer.

details.overview: An automation tool that mimics an API by scraping job listings from Duunitoriâ€™s website using Puppeteer.
features: Extract job title, company, and details from HTML
challenges: Navigating changing HTML structure: Used robust selectors and fallback logic
Automated daily execution via Task Scheduler
role: Wrote Puppeteer scraping scripts
Implemented data parsing and JSON export
Configured automation

projectList.label: Automation Tool
projectList.title: Automated Motivation System
projectList.description: A Node.js-based automation tool that sends daily motivational messages via SMS using the Twilio API.

details.overview: A Node.js-based automation tool that sends daily motivational messages via SMS using the Twilio API.
role: Integrated Twilio API
Built scheduling and message randomization logic
